Why AGH University?

Discover AGH University

A modern, globally-oriented, research-intensive university with a social mission. AGH UST provides education and carries out scientific research in line with the contemporary needs of the economy. Through this social side of the university’s activities, it influences the development of research areas and the creation of new fields of study.

History and traditions

The efforts to establish a Polish mining school in Krakow and to appoint suitable teaching staff began in the second half of the 19th century and intensified when Galicia gained autonomy in 1860. Scientific achievements and modern laboratories

A great success of the AGH UST was to gain the status of a research university. In the ministerial programme ‘Excellence Initiative – Research University’, the winners of the first competition were the 10 best Polish universities.

AGH University in rankings

AGH University ranks first among Polish technical universities. 1st place among Polish technical universities in the CWUR ranking (2022–2023 edition).
